name: Paw Puppy Run Adventure
description:
Paw Puppy Patrol Run Adventure is an endless run game with a journey of puppy dog that brings your childhood back. In the super jungle world, puppy must jump over or lean the obstacles. It must never lose its speed to complete his missions. The bones must be summed up to lose energy. It should not miss the power ups that will suddenly come out. Help the puppy to complete the patrol task.

Features;
- Mobile optimized quality graphics.
- Colorful forest cover.
- Excellent animations.
- Challenging obstacle.
- Various power ups.

Complete special tasks.
Don't touch the obstacles to get the best score. Share your score with friends.
The newest endless running game is totally free.
Have Fun!
